alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:40AM CDT until July 24 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WYANDOTTE...NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHERN CLAY... SOUTHEASTERN PLATTE AND JACKSON COUNTIES... At 740 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kansas City Downtown, or over Kansas City Kansas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Shawnee, Blue Springs, Lenexa, Leawood, Raytown, Liberty, Gladstone, Grandview, Prairie Village, Grain Valley, Merriam, Mission, Parkville, Greenwood, North Kansas City and Fairway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 417 and 423. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 225 and 235. Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 6. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 50 and 75. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
